sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
redeems a bad thing or situation
, prepreči, da položaj ne postane popolna polomija.

seg.quote: Swallow was doing his best to redeem what could be a disastrous dinner.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
redeems oneself
, potem ko se je neprimerno vedel, naredi nekaj, zaradi česar imajo ljudje o njem spet dobro mnenje.

seg.quote: He was trying to redeem himself for his earlier failure.
They came to redeem their jewellery.
